scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile
scripts.coverage: npm run build && npx hardhat coverage --temp artifacts --network coverage
scripts.deploy-testnet: npm run build && npx hardhat run --network base-sepolia scripts/deploy.ts
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npx hardhat run --network base scripts/deploy.ts
scripts.deploy-proxy-testnet: npm run build && npx hardhat run --network base-sepolia scripts/deployProxy.ts
scripts.deploy-proxy: npm run build && npx hardhat run --network base scripts/deployProxy.ts
scripts.verify-testnet: npm run build && npx hardhat run --network base-sepolia scripts/verify.ts
scripts.verify: npm run build && npx hardhat run --network base scripts/verify.ts
scripts.upgrade-testnet: npm run build && npx hardhat run --network base-sepolia scripts/upgrade.ts
scripts.upgrade: npm run build && npx hardhat run --network base scripts/upgrade.ts
